thread.section_title: Warrior Trading Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Warrior Trading | warriortrading.com
thread.title: elijah

author: elijah
title: elijah
text: I am satisfied with everything that Warrior Trading has taught me. Ross and the other guys are great traders and teachers. I would recommend this course to anybody trying to learn to day or swing trade. At first I was a bit hesitant to give my money to WT but from my experiences I have been totally blown away and have absolutely no regrets with purchasing this course.
